task.title: Place Ribbon Spools on Spool Shafts
task.shortdesc: When you are changing the ribbon of your typewriter, you will place two ribbon spools on the spool shafts.

taskbody.prereq: If there are existing ribbon spools, you must remove them first. You will need a new set of ribbon spools that are compatible with your typewriter model.

step.cmd: Pull back one of the spring-loaded ribbon arms and place one of the new ribbon spools onto the ribbon spool shaft.
Ensure that the ribbon coming off of the spool is directed toward the back of the typewriter and is not twisted.
Adjust the ribbon spool so that the spool shaft pin fits into the designated slot on the new ribbon spool.
Ensure the ribbon is flush with the spool and let go of the spring-loaded ribbon arm.
Repeat for the other ribbon spool.
